description.narrative: IFC''s development impact in this Project includes: (i) Demonstration Effect: Through this Project, which will be one of the first wind farms in Serbia, IFC will be supporting the renewable energy sector in the country and hence will set an example to potential investors and financial institutions; (ii) Increasing Renewable Energy Capacity: The Project envisages adding 42 MW of wind energy capacity in Serbia where the share of coal fired generation constitutes approximately two thirds of total electricity generation; and (iii) Displacement of GHG Emissions: The Project is expected to displace carbon from the country''s thermal generation plants, reduce pollution and contribute to the effort to combat global warming. Once completed the Project is expected to avoid an average annual GHG emission of 48,650 tCO2 (with total GHG avoided estimated at 778,400 tCO2).

Serbian WinCo d.o.o. (Electrawinds Serbia or the Company) is developing a 42 MW greenfield wind farm project near the town of Alibunar in the Banat region of Serbia (north-eastern part of the country, near the Romanian border) (the Project). If successful, the Project will become one of the first wind farms in the country. The Company is a special purpose entity established solely for the development of the Project and is 100% owned by Electrawinds SE (Electrawinds or the Sponsor). With its aspirations to join the EU, Serbia has incorporated renewable energy targets in its energy policy, and will be increasingly bound by these in future. At the same time, the region suffers from increasing energy deficits, which place a premium on domestic energy generation. IFCs involvement in the financing of the Project is expected to provide strong support to the nascent renewable energy sector in Serbia.

name.narrative: The Project is located near the town of Alibunar in the Banat region of Serbia (north-eastern part of the country, near the Romanian border). The Project site is located in rural area and is greenfield. The Project site is 250 meters to the state road.

activity-description.narrative: A description that qualifies the activity taking place at the location.

sector.narrative: V-BC - Wind Power - Renewable Energy Generation

title.narrative: Summary of Investment Information - Anticipated Impact Measurement & Monitoring (AIMM) Assessment and Main Environmental & Social Risks and Impacts of the Project
